channel.title: :house: Home on Omelet
channel.description: Recent content in :house: Home on Omelet

item.title: :anchor: Install
item.description: üç∫ Homebrew brew install tamada/brew/omelet Go lang go get github.com/tamada/omelet üõ†Ô∏è Build from source codes $ git clone https://github.com/tamada/omelet.git $ cd omelet $ make

item.title: :fork_and_knife: Usage
item.description: üìé CLI $ omelet --help omelet version 1.0.0 omelet [OPTIONS] <PROJECT_DIRs...> OPTIONS -c, --classpath <PATH> specifies classpath separated with colon. -d, --delete-tempfiles delete temporary files after running. -e, --excludes <REGEXP> specifies target exclusion rules for unit tests. Default is "" (no filtering). -i, --includes <REGEXP> specifies target inclusion rules for unit tests. Default is "" (no filtering). -n, --no-coverage no calculating coverage of test codes. -v, --verbose verbose mode. -h, --help print this message.

item.title: :smile: About
item.description: üìú License üêæ Developers Haruaki Tamada Why does the product names omelet? Because the lunch was omelet, when I developed this product.
